page.title: 08LIVING IN THE COUNTRYSIDE
page.content: The country is a nice place to live because you can see different kinds of animals and different wild flowers.In the country you can make dens and you can see the combines combining the fields or ploughing.The country is nice because you have nice smells and its not so noisy as a town.Most people like it in the country because they can go for walks up the footpaths. You can walk up the hill and find a good place to picnic.You could get a beaut- iful view and take some photographs. The country has fewer shops than town. Most people would prefer to live in the country because it's quieter.There is a lot of nature about.There are not any cinemas in the country.I like to live in the country because there is more space to play.In a town it is all built-up but in the country there are woods to explore where we make dens.
